name: Gold Rush! - For Mini Jam 85
description:
Hey Everyone!

My name is Franz, this is my first Game Jam Ever!!, soooo pleased to have completed something. Just getting started with Unreal Engine. This is my first game ever also. 

The main objective of the game is to finish the circuit in under 60 seconds. Hope you Enjoy!

This was quite a challenging project so there are some things i wasnt able to get done on time. 
- Music
- Maybe more puzzles to make it more challenging
- A menu

How to play the game:

On Keyboard:

Move: WASD
Jump: Space Bar
Look Around:  Mouse

On Controller(Xbox Preferably):

Move: Left Thumbstick
Look Around: Right Thumbstick
Jump: A button on Xbox controller, X on PS4

I didnt get enought time to build a menu So to exit the game you need to Press Alt+F4 on window, and Command+Q on Mac.
